greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of ways to write n = k + m (0 < k <= m) with k! + prime(m) prime.
comment: We have verified this for n up to 10^7. For n = 1356199, the least positive integer k with k! + prime(n-k) prime is 4496. For n = 7212995, the smallest positive integer k with k! + prime(n-k) prime is 4507.
link: Zhi-Wei Sun, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..2000
Z.-W. Sun, Problems on combinatorial properties of primes, arXiv:1402.6641, 2014
results.author: _Zhi-Wei Sun_, Dec 05 2013
